name: Anticore
description:
5 different game modes:
  1. Normal - Exactly what you would expect from an asteroid shooter game
  2. Hearty - Avoid enemy hearts that you are unable to shoot down
  3. Survival - Start off with one life.
  4. Party!
  5. Hell - Starts off fairly slow, but it speeds up much faster than Normal
Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Space to shoot
  • Enter to start
Power-ups and Downs:

Power-ups move at a random direction and angle, and only stay on screen for 7 seconds. Power-downs move towards your ships position when it is created and last 1.5 seconds if the player touches it.

  • Shield - One use, lasts until you hit an object
  • Bomb - If hit by a bullet, all asteroids and other enemies are destroyed, but don't let your ship run into it.
  • Heart - Very rare in all game modes except hearty. Gives the player one more life
  • Stop Sign - Removes player's ability to move
  • Peace - Removes player's ability to shoot
Misc:

This is our first game, so constructive criticism and ideas for improvement are always welcome and encouraged! We are hoping to add a few new ship designs that the player could buy with in-game currency.
